description: Apply High Definition Compatible Digital (HDCD) decoding.
name: hdcd

options.description: Disable any format conversion or resampling in the filter graph. (default true)
options.name: disable_autoconvert

options.description: Process stereo channels together. Only apply target_gain when both channels match. (default true)
options.name: process_stereo

options.description: Code detect timer period in ms. (from 100 to 60000) (default 2000)
options.name: cdt_ms

options.description: Always extend peaks above -3dBFS even when PE is not signaled. (default false)
options.name: force_pe

choices.help: gain adjustment level at each sample
choices.name: lle

choices.help: samples where the code detect timer is active
choices.name: cdt

choices.help: samples where the target gain does not match between channels
choices.name: tgm

options.description: Replace audio with solid tone and signal some processing aspect in the amplitude. (from 0 to 4) (default off)
options.name: analyze_mode

options.description: Valid bits per sample (location of the true LSB). (from 16 to 24) (default 16)
options.name: bits_per_sample
